docs.name: lumined.js
docs.description: Hello this is the documentation for lumine Discord

subDocs.value: Installation method, you can use npm like:

examples.description: You can make bot use this example
examples.code:
const bot = new Client();
bot.login(token) //Paste your token
examples.alert: If you don't add the token in the Client(), you can use login(token)

examples.description: Alternatively, you can put the token into the client in this way:
examples.alert: You don't need to put the token in login(token)

docs.name: Embed
docs.description: You want make embed? use this builder, Optional if you want to create an embed but are afraid of forgetting some important things
